Text: For the completists, there are two novelized versions of A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. The earlier versions were written by Alan Dean Foster, Donald Glut and James Kahn respectively. The newer versions were 'junior novelizations' penned by Ryder Wyndham. This torrent just contains the originals.

This is a great torrent. 
For the younger readers, I wonder if anyone has the Episode I-VI junior novels??
